title: GABA | Integrative Therapeutics®
cleaned_text: Vegan | Gluten Free [Log in](/account?locale=en) [View full details](/products/gaba) Product information IMPORTANT AMINO ACID NEUROTRANSMITTER* GABA (gamma-aminobutyric acid) is an important amino acid neurotransmitter in the brain.* It regulates healthy brain nerve cell functions and supports healthy neurochemical balance.* IMPORTANT AMINO ACID NEUROTRANSMITTER* GABA (gamma-aminobutyric acid) is an important amino acid neurotransmitter in the brain.* It regulates healthy brain nerve cell functions and supports healthy neurochemical balance.* INGREDIENTS 750mg GABA (gamma-aminobutyric acid) ** Daily Value (DV) not established Percent daily value is based on a 2000 calorie diet Other Ingredients GABA Does Not Contain Gluten Corn Soy Dairy Colors Artificial Flavors Wheat Other Details UPC: 871791003415 SKU: 226008 DIRECTIONS GABA Directions and/or DosageAdults take 1 capsule once or twice daily, or as recommended by a healthcare professional. Not formulated for children. WarningDo not take if you are pregnant or nursing. If you have high blood pressure, or if you are taking any medications, consult a healthcare professional before use. Avoid the use of alcohol when taking GABA. Keep out of reach of children. Safety sealed with inner seal. Do not use if seal is broken or missing. Keep tightly closed. Store at room temperature. Avoid excessive heat and direct sunlight.
